dct_title_s: Planisfère ou mapemonde avec les degrez de la latitude & de longitude
dct_alternative_sm: Nouvelle métode pour aprende facilement et sans maître la géographie, et les prem[i]ers principes du blazon
dct_description_sm: Engraved map showing coastlines and shorelines and lines of latitude and longitude. Only the Cape of Good Hope, Paris and the Canary Islands are named. Prime meridian: Ferro. Column of printed text affixed at left.
California shown as an unlabeled island with some islands to the east.
From Nouvelle métode pour aprende facilement et sans maître la géographie, et les prem[i]ers principes du blazon.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
